model.model: LGB MTS 22592 with onboard sound decoder

variable.label: Short Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Primary 2 digit address - LGB 0-22 for add-on, 1-23 for onboard CV1

variable.label: Starting voltage
variable.tooltip: Sets the starting voltage at throttle speed step 1 - 0: slow, 255: maximum speed CV2

variable.label: Acceleration
variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate - 1: rapid acceleration, 255: gradual acceleration CV3

variable.label: Braking
variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate - 1: rapid braking, 255: gradual braking) CV4

variable.label: Maximum Motor Voltage
variable.tooltip: Sets the maximum voltage at full throttle - 1: slow, 255: maximum speed CV5

variable.label: Software Version Number
variable.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only) CV7

variable.label: Manufacturer Code
variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only) CV8

variable.label: Motor Frequency
variable.tooltip: Sets the motor drive frequency - Note: Back-EMF only works with 16 kHz CV9

variable.label: F1 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F2 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F3 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F4 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F5 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F6 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended 4 digit address (Range 128-10239) (not LGB MTS) CV17-18

variable.label: Normal direction of motion
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward CV29

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode CV29

variable.label: Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion) CV29

variable.label: Use Speed Table
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table CV29

variable.label: Addressing Mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use short or long address CV29

variable.label: Voltage for F1 terminal
variable.tooltip: Voltage for F1 terminal - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs or smoke generator, 32:maximum voltage CV49

variable.label: Voltage for lighting terminals
variable.tooltip: Voltage for front, rear and interior light - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs, 32:maximum voltage CV50

variable.label: Command for F1 terminal
variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the F1 terminal CV51

enumChoice.choice: buttons 1-8 with fast pulse string (for 55021 with P-Update only)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for front lighting terminal
variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the front light terminal CV52

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Command for rear lighting terminal
variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the rear light terminal CV53

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: hand-off function
variable.tooltip: Determines if MTS hand-off is on or off CV54

variable.label: MTS Back-EMF
variable.tooltip: Determines if digital back-EMF is on or off CV54

variable.label: analog Back-EMF
variable.tooltip: Determines if analog back-EMF is on or off CV54

variable.label: Load dependent sound
variable.tooltip: Determines if load dependent sound is on or off CV54

variable.label: F1 output flashing
variable.tooltip: Determines if F1 is constant or flashing CV54

variable.label: F2 output flashing
variable.tooltip: Determines if F2 is constant or flashing CV54

variable.label: Automatic brake sounds
variable.tooltip: Determines if automatic brake sounds are on or off CV54

variable.label: Loco dependent bit 8
variable.tooltip: Check your loco's manual to determine use of this bit CV54

variable.label: Voltage for F2 terminal
variable.tooltip: Voltage for F2 terminal - 1:low voltage, 5:5V light bulbs or smoke generator, 32:maximum voltage CV56

variable.label: Command for F2 terminal
variable.tooltip: Command which triggers the F2 terminal CV57

enumChoice.choice: lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is reversing)
button 1 (on only when loco is reversing)
lighting button (LGB=9, others=0) (on only when loco is moving forward)
button 1 (on only when loco is moving forward)

variable.label: Pause Time between changes in direction
variable.tooltip: Pause equals programmed value x 0.5 seconds CV58

variable.label: Back-EMF Maximum Adjustment Factor
variable.tooltip: 1: small steps, 255: large steps (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV) CV60

variable.label: Back-EMF Adjustment Frequency
variable.tooltip: 0: immediate adjustment, 255: maximum delay (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV) CV61

variable.label: Back-EMF Maximum Adjustment
variable.tooltip: 0: no adjustment, 255: maximum adjustment (Note: LGB recommends not changing this CV) CV62

variable.label: ID for Decoder Type
variable.tooltip: ID for Decoder Type (read only) CV106

variable.label: Horn: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Horn CV131

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Brake CV132

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Bell CV133

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Coupling CV134

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Engineer enters cab CV135

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Rolling train CV136

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Compressor CV137

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Trill whistle CV138

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Gear box direction change CV139

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches No sound 10 CV140

variable.label: No sound 11: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches No sound 11 CV141

variable.label: No sound 12: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches No sound 12 CV142

variable.label: Sound On/Off: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches sound (amplifier) on/off CV147

variable.label: Loco Start Up/Shut Down: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Loco Start Up/Shut Down CV148

enumChoice.choice: Loco always on (not switched with F-Key)

variable.label: Random Sounds Generator
variable.tooltip: Random generator active or not CV149

variable.label: Standing Phase Noise
variable.tooltip: Standing Phase Noise active or not CV150

label.label: To turn off, use Speed Table pane
